arts.ttl: Leeds, Burnley on verge of Prem returns after wins
'Lost our heads': Watford boss Tom Cleverley makes honest admission on red cards during Burnley defeat
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley refused to use the referee’s display as an excuse for Watford’s defeat to Burnley – accepting his side “lost their heads”.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's comeback win against Watford and 'world class' James Trafford
arts.sum: Scott Parker singled out “world class” James Trafford for praise after his Burnley side came from behind once again to beat Watford.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Watford as ‘world class’ verdict given on 9/10 star of the show - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley came from behind for the second time in three games to beat Watford – putting themselves on the cusp of promotion.
How the game at Vicarage Road unfolded as the Hornets ended with nine men after taking the lead early on.

arts.ttl: Brownhill edges Burnley towards promotion with win at nine-man Watford
arts.sum: For a large portion of this match – pretty much the bulk of the first half, in fact – any spectator would have been hard-pressed to identify the Premier League-destined team on the cusp of an all-time Football League record for clean sheets. Not only did Watford find the rarest of routes past James Trafford, but the Burnley goalkeeper was forced to endure a torrid time to prevent the hosts from becoming the first team to score two goals against him in the Championship this season. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Josh Brownhill winner puts Burnley on the verge of Premier League return
arts.sum: Josh Brownhill’s 14th goal of the Championship season had given the visitors the lead.

arts.ttl: Watford 1-2 Burnley: Clarets one game away from promotion after coming from behind to win again
arts.sum: Burnley came from behind to win for the second time in three games to move back on top of the Championship with just three games remaining.

arts.ttl: 25 images of Burnley fans arriving at Vicarage Road for Championship clash against Watford
arts.sum: Scott Parker’s men head to Vicarage Road this afternoon as they continue their push for automatic promotion to the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Watford vs Burnley confirmed XIs and team news as Scott Parker keeps faith with Norwich City side
arts.sum: Scott Parker has kept faith with the side that beat Norwich City last time out for today's Good Friday clash with Watford.
